CORNELL UNIVERSITY MEDICAL COLLEGE 1300 YORK AVENUE NEW YORK, N. Y. OFFICE OF THE BUSINESS MANAGER July 5, 1956 Mr. W. T. Hoyt Executive Secretary Tobacco Industry Research Committee 150 East 42 Street New York 17, New York Dear Mr. Hoyt: Please accept the thanks of the University for the Committee's check in the amount of $2,750, representing the first quarterly payment of the research.grant awarded to Dr. Janet Travell in the Department of Pharmacology. We are most grateful for your continued interest and support of .Dr. Travell°s work. Sincerely yours, Edward K. Ta; EKT;pfb Business Manager cc - Dr. Travell Dr. Riker Dr. Luckey Dr. Hinsey A/C 717
